GE07bhg4c16u:384: śrīdharaḥ : āsurīṃ vistaraśo nirūpayati pravṛttiṃ cety ādi-dvādaśabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:385: dharme pravṛttim adharmān nivṛttiṃ cāsura-svabhāvā janā na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c16u:386: ataḥ śaucam ācāraḥ satyaṃ ca teṣu nāsty eva ||7||
GE07bhg4c16u:387: madhusūdanaḥ : varjanīyām āsurīṃ sampadaṃ prāṇi-viśeṣaṇatayā tān aham ity
GE07bhg4c16u:388: ataḥ prāktanair dvādaśabhiḥ ślokair vivṛṇoti pravṛttim iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:392: atas teṣu na śaucaṃ dvividhaṃ nāpy ācāro
GE07bhg4c16u:397: aśaucā anācārā anṛta-vādino hy āsurā māyāvinaḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:400: baladevaḥ : āsuraṃ sargam āha pravṛttiṃ ceti dvādaśabhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:401: āsurā janā dharme pravṛttim adharmān nivṛttim ca na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c16u:402: ca-kārābhyāṃ tayoḥ pratipādake vidhi-niṣedha-vākye ca na jānanti |
GE07bhg4c16u:404: teṣu śaucaṃ bāhyābhyantaraṃ tat-pravṛtty-upayogi na vidyate |
GE07bhg4c16u:409: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram |
GE07bhg4c16u:411: śrīdharaḥ : nanu vedoktayor dharmādharmayoḥ pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ ca kathaṃ na viduḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:412: kuto vā dharmādharmayor anaṅgīkāre jagataḥ sukha-duḥkhādi-vyavasthā syāt |
GE07bhg4c16u:416: nāsti satyaṃ veda-purāṇādi-pramāṇaṃ yasmin tādṛśaṃ jagad
GE07bhg4c16u:418: vedādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na manyanta ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:419: tad uktaṃ trayo vedasya kartāro bhaṇḍa-dhūrta-niśācarā ity ādi || ataeva nāsti dharmādharma-rūpā pratiṣṭhā vyavasthā-hetur yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c16u:422: ataeva nāsti īśvaraḥ kartā vyavasthāpakaś ca yasya tādṛśaṃ jagad āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:431: strī-puruṣayor ubhayoḥ kāma eva pravāha-rūpeṇa hetur asyety āhur ity arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c16u:433: pratipādakaṃ vedākhyaṃ pramāṇam asti nirdoṣaṃ bhagavad-ājñā-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:434: sarva-loka-prasiddhaṃ tad-upajīvīni ca smṛti-purāṇetihāsādīni santi, tat kathaṃ pravṛtti-nivṛtti-tat-pramāṇādy ajñānam |
GE07bhg4c16u:435: jñāne vājñollaṅghināṃ śāsitari bhagavati sati kathaṃ tad-ananuṣṭhānena śaucācārādi-rahitatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:436: duṣṭānāṃ śāsitur bhagavato 'pi loka-veda-prasiddhatvād ata āha asatyam iti
GE07bhg4c16u:438: tad-upajīvi purāṇādi ca nāsti yatra tad asatyaṃ veda-svarūpasya
GE07bhg4c16u:440: ata eva nāsti dharmādharma-rūpā pratiṣṭhitā vyavasthā-hetur yasya tad apratiṣṭham
GE07bhg4c16u:441: | tathā nāsti śubhāśubhayoḥ karmaṇoḥ phala-dāneśvaro niyantā yasya tad
GE07bhg4c16u:443: balavat pāpa-pratibandhād vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ te na manyante |
GE07bhg4c16u:444: tataś ca tad bodhitayor dharmādharmayor īśvarasya cānaṅgīkārād yatheṣṭācaraṇena te puruṣārtha-bhraṣṭā ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:446: parameśvareṇa rahitaṃ jagad iṣyate cet kāraṇābhāvāt kathaṃ tad utpattir ity āśaṅkyāha aparaspara-saṃbhūtaṃ kāma-prayuktayoḥ strī-puruṣayor
GE07bhg4c16u:447: anyonya-saṃyogāt saṃbhūtam jagat kāma-haitukaṃ kāma-hetukam eva
GE07bhg4c16u:449: nanu dharmādy apy asti kāraṇam ? nety āha kim anyat, anyad adṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:452: paryavasānāt svābhāvikam eva jagad-vaicitryam astu dṛṣṭe sambhavaty
GE07bhg4c16u:454: ataḥ kāma eva prāṇināṃ kāraṇaṃ nānyad adṛṣṭeśvarādīty āhur iti lokāyatika-dṛṣṭir iyam ||8||
GE07bhg4c16u:455: viśvanāthaḥ : asurāṇāṃ matam āha asatyaṃ mithyā-bhūtaṃ bhramopalabdham eva jagat te vadnait
GE07bhg4c16u:457: na hi kha-puṣpasya kiñcid adhiṣṭhānam astīti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:458: anīśvaraṃ mithyābhūtatvād eva īśvara-kartṛkam etan na bhavati |
GE07bhg4c16u:462: kāma-haitukam kāmo vādinām icchaiva hetur yasya tat |
GE07bhg4c16u:463: mithyābhūtatvād eva ye yathā kalpayituṃ śaknuvanti tathiavaitad iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:464: kecit punar evaṃ vyācakṣate asatyaṃ nāsti satyaṃ veda-purāṇādikaṃ pramāṇaṃ yatra tat |
GE07bhg4c16u:465: tad uktaṃ trayo vedasya kartāro bhaṇḍa-dhūrta-niśācarā ity ādi |
GE07bhg4c16u:466: apratiṣṭhaṃ nāsti dharmādharma-rūpā pratiṣṭhā vyavasthā yatra tat |
GE07bhg4c16u:470: nanu strī-puṃsayoḥ paraspara-prayatna-viśeṣād jagad etad utpannaṃ dṛśyata ity api bhrama eva kulālasya ghaṭotpādane jñānam iva mātāpitros
GE07bhg4c16u:471: tādṛśa-bālotpādane kila nāsti jñānm iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:472: kim anyat kim anyat vaktavyam iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:473: tasmād idaṃ jagat kāma-hetukaṃ kāmena svecchayaiva hetukā hetu-kalpakā yatra tat |
GE07bhg4c16u:474: yukti-balena ye yat paramāṇu-māyeśvarādikaṃ jalpayituṃ śaknuvanti te tad eva tasya hetuṃ vadantīty arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c16u:475: baladevaḥ : teṣāṃ siddhāntān darśayati tatraika-jīva-vādinām āha asatyam iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:482: tasmād asatyaṃ jagat ta eva manyante |
GE07bhg4c16u:483: ekaiva nirviśeṣo sarva-pramāṇāvedyā cid-bhramād eko jīvas tato 'nyaj jaḍa-jīveśvarātmakaṃ tad-ajñānāt pratibhāṣate |
GE07bhg4c16u:488: atha svabhāva-vādināṃ bauddhānām āha aparaspara-sambhūtam iti
GE07bhg4c16u:489_0: strī-puruṣa-sambhoga-janyaṃ jagan na bhavati ghaṭotpādane kulālasyeva bālotpādane
GE07bhg4c16u:489_1: pitrāder jñānābhāvāt saty apy asakṛt sambhoge santānān utpatteś ca svedajādīnām akasmād
GE07bhg4c16u:494: kāma eva pravāhātmanā hetur asyeti svārthe ṭhañ |
GE07bhg4c16u:495: athavā jainānām āha kāmaḥ svecchayaiva hetur asyeti |
GE07bhg4c16u:496: yukti-balena yo yat kalpayituṃ śaknuyāt sa tad eva tasya hetuṃ vadatīty arthaḥ ||8||
GE07bhg4c16u:500: etāṃ lokāyatikānāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ darśanam āśritya naṣṭātmano malīmasa-cittāḥ santo 'lpa-buddhayo duṣṭārtha-mātra-matayaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:501: ateva ugraṃ hiṃsraṃ karma yeṣāṃ te ahitā vairiṇo bhūtvā jagataḥ kṣayāya prabhavanti udbhavantīty arthaḥ ||9||
GE07bhg4c16u:502: madhusūdanaḥ : iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ śāstrīya-dṛṣṭivad iṣṭaivety āśaṅkyāha etām iti
GE07bhg4c16u:503: | etāṃ prāg-uktāṃ lokāyatika-dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhyālambya naṣṭatmāno bhraṣṭa-para-loka-sādhanā alpa-buddhayo dṛṣṭa-mātroddeśa-pravṛtta-mataya
GE07bhg4c16u:504: ugra-karmāṇo hiṃsā ahitāḥ śatravo jagataḥ prāṇi-jātasya kṣayāya
GE07bhg4c16u:508: viśvanāthaḥ : evaṃ vādino 'surāḥ kecin naṣṭātmānaḥ kecid alpajñānāḥ kecid ugra-karmāṇaḥ svacchandācārā mahā-nārakino bhavantīty āha |
GE07bhg4c16u:511: baladevaḥ : sva-sva-mata-nirṇāyakāni darśanāni ca taiḥ kṛtāni yāny āsthāya
GE07bhg4c16u:514: ugra-karmāṇo hiṃsā-paiśunya-pāruṣyādi-karma-niṣṭhā jagato 'hitāḥ śatravaś ca santasya kṣayāya prabhavanti parmārthāj jagad-bhraṃśayantīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:519: duṣpūraṃ purayitum aśakyaṃ kāmam āśritya dambhādibhir yuktāḥ santaḥ kṣudra-devatārādhanādau pravartante |
GE07bhg4c16u:521: asad-grāhān gṛhītvā anena mantreṇaitāṃ devatām ārādhya mahā-nidhīn sādhayiṣyāma ity ādīn durāgrahān moha-mātreṇa svīkṛtya pravartante |
GE07bhg4c16u:522: aśuci-vratāḥ aśucīni madya-māṃsādi-viṣayīṇi vratāni yeṣāṃ te
GE07bhg4c16u:523: madhusūdanaḥ : te ca yadā kenacit karmaṇā manuṣya-yonim āpadyante, tadā kāmaṃ tat tad dṛṣṭa-viṣayābhilāṣaṃ duṣpūraṃ pūrayitum aśakyaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:526: mahad-avadhīraṇā-hetunānvitā asad-grāhān aśubha-niścayān anena mantreṇemāṃ devatām ārādhya kāminīnām ākarṣaṇaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ, anena mantreṇemāṃ devatām
GE07bhg4c16u:527: ārādhya mahānidhīn sādhayiṣyāma ity ādi-durāgraha-rūpān mohād avivekād gṛhītvā na tu śāstrāt, aśuci-vratāḥ pravartante yatra kutrāpy avaidike
GE07bhg4c16u:531: viśvanāthaḥ : asad-grāhān pravartante kumate eva pravṛttā bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c16u:533: baladevaḥ : atha teṣāṃ durvṛttatāṃ durācāratāṃ cāha kāmam iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:534: duṣpūraṃ kāmaṃ viṣaya-tṛṣṇām āśritya mohān na tu śāstrād asad-grāhān
GE07bhg4c16u:549: pralayo maraṇam evānto yasyāstām aparimeyāṃ parimātum aśakyāṃ cintām āśritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:552: etāvad iti kāmopabhoga eva paramaḥ puruṣārtho nānyad astīti kṛta-niścayāḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:554: tathā ca bārhaspatyaṃ sūtraṃ - kāma evaikaḥ puruṣārtha iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:557: madhusūdanaḥ : tān eva punar viśinaṣṭi cintām iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:560: parm}atum aśakyāṃ pralayo maraṇam evānto yasyās tāṃ pralayāntāṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:562: na kevalam aśuci-vratāḥ pravartante kiṃ tv etādṛśīṃ cintāṃ copāśritā iti samuccayārthaś ca-kāraḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:563: sadānanta-cintā-parā api na kadācit pāralaukika-cintāyutāḥ kiṃ tu kāmopabhoga-paramāḥ kāmyanta iti kāmā dṛṣṭāḥ śabdādayo viṣayās
GE07bhg4c16u:564: tad-upabhoga eva paramaḥ puruṣārtho na dharmādir yeṣāṃ te tathā |
GE07bhg4c16u:565_0: pāralaukikam uttamaṃ sukhaṃ kuto na kāmayante tatrāha etāvad dṛṣṭam eva sukhaṃ nānyad
GE07bhg4c16u:565_1: etac charīra-viyoge bhogyaṃ sukham asti etat kāyātiriktasya bhoktur abhāvād iti niścitā
GE07bhg4c16u:565_2: evaṃ-niścayavantaḥ tathā ca bārhaspatyaṃ sūtraṃ caitanya-viśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣaḥ,
GE07bhg4c16u:567: etāvad iti indriyāṇi viṣaya-sukhe majjantu nāma kā cintā ity etāvad eva
GE07bhg4c16u:580: teṣāṃ śatair baddhā itas tata ākṛṣyamāṇāḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:582: kāma-bhogārtham anyāyena cauryādinārthānāṃ sañcayān rāśīn īhanta icchanti ||12||
GE07bhg4c16u:584: anavagatopāyārtha-viṣayā vā prārthanā āśāstā eva pāśā iva
GE07bhg4c16u:585_0: bandhana-hetutvāt pāśās teṣāṃ śataiḥ samūhair baddhā iva śreyasaḥ pacyāvyetas tata
GE07bhg4c16u:585_1: ākṛṣya nīyamānāḥ kāma-krodhau param ayanam āśrayo yesāṃ te kāma-krodha-parāyaṇāḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:586: īhante kartuṃ ceṣṭante kāma-bhogārthaṃ na tu dharmārtham anyāyena parasva-haraṇādinārtha-saṃcayān dhana-rāśīn |
GE07bhg4c16u:587: saṃcayān iti bahu-vacanena dhana-prāptāv api tat-tṛṣṇānuvṛtter
GE07bhg4c16u:593: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham |
GE07bhg4c16u:594: idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam ||13||
GE07bhg4c16u:595: śrīdharaḥ : teṣāṃ manorathaṃ kathayan naraka-prāptim āha idam adya mayeti caturbhiḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:599: eteṣāṃ ca trayāṇāṃ ślokānām ity ajñāna-vimohitāḥ santo narake patantīti
GE07bhg4c16u:603: idaṃ dhanam adyedānīṃ anenopāyena mayā labdham |
GE07bhg4c16u:604: idaṃ tad anya-manorathaṃ manas-tuṣṭi-karaṃ śīghram eva prāpsye |
GE07bhg4c16u:606: idam api bahutaraṃ bhaviṣyaty āgāmini saṃvatsare punar dhanam |
GE07bhg4c16u:607: evaṃ dhana-tṛṣṇākulāḥ patanti narake 'śucāv ity agrimeṇānvayaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c16u:609: baladevaḥ : teṣāṃ dhanāśānuvṛttiṃ manorājyoktyā vivṛṇvan naraka-nipātam
GE07bhg4c16u:613: imaṃ manorathaṃ manaḥ-priyam artham aham eva
GE07bhg4c16u:614: sva-balena prāpsyāmi, svabalenaiva labdham idaṃ dhanaṃ mama sampraty asti
GE07bhg4c16u:615: | idam iṣyamāṇaṃ dhanam āgāmi-varṣe mad-balenaiva me bhaviṣyati |
GE07bhg4c16u:616: na tv adṛṣṭa-balena īśvara-prasādena vety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:617: evaṃ dhana-tṛṣṇāṃ prapañcya duṣṭaṃ bhāvaṃ prapañcayati asāv iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:619: aparān api śatrūn aham eva haniṣyāmi |
GE07bhg4c16u:621: dāra-dhanādi ca neṣyāmīti ca-śabdāt matto na ko 'pi jīved iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:622: nanv īśvarecchām adṛṣṭaṃ ca kecij jaya-hetum āhus tatrāhaaham eveśvaraḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:623: svatantro yad ahaṃ bhogī svato nikhila-bhoga-sampannaḥ siddho 'smīti |
GE07bhg4c16u:625: tarhi sa mām eveśvaraṃ kalpayatu na tu matto 'nyam anupalabdher iti bhāvaḥ ||13||
GE07bhg4c16u:627: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api |
GE07bhg4c16u:628: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī ||14||
GE07bhg4c16u:633: evaṃ lobhaṃ prapañcya tad-abhiprāya-kathanenaiva teṣāṃ krodhaṃ prapañcayati asāv iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:634: asau devadatta-nāmā mayā hataḥ śatrur atidurjayaḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:635: | ata idānīm anāyāsena haniṣye ca haniṣyāmi aparān sarvān api śatrūn |
GE07bhg4c16u:636: na ko 'pi mat-sakāśāj jīviṣyatīty aper arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:638: tān kiṃ tu teṣāṃ dāra-dhanādikam api grahīṣyāmīty abhiprāyaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:639: kutas tavaitādṛśaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tvat-tulyānāṃ tvad-adhikānāṃ vā śatrūṇāṃ sambhavād
GE07bhg4c16u:640: ity ata āha - īśvaro 'haṃ na kevalaṃ mānuṣo yena mat-tulyo 'dhiko vā kaścit syāt |
GE07bhg4c16u:641: kim ete kariṣyanti varākāḥ sarvathā nāsti mat-tulyaḥ kaścid ity anenābhiprāyeṇśvaratvaṃ vivṛṇoti
GE07bhg4c16u:642: yasmād ahaṃ bhogī sarvair bhogopakaraṇair upetaḥ siddho 'haṃ putra-bhṛtyādibhiḥ sahāyaiḥ saṃpannaḥ svato 'pi balavān atyojasvī sukhī sarvathā nīrogaḥ ||14||
GE07bhg4c16u:654: modiṣye harṣaṃ prāpsyāmi ity evam ajñānena vimohitā mithyābhiniveśaṃ prāpitāḥ ||15||
GE07bhg4c16u:655: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu dhanena kulena vā kaścit tat-tulyaḥ syād ity ata āha āḍhya iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:656: āḍhyo dhanī, abhijanavān kulīno 'py aham evāsmi |
GE07bhg4c16u:660: syād ity ata āha -- yakṣye yāgenāpy anyān abhibhaviṣyāmi, dāsyāmi dhanaṃ stāvakebhyo naṭādibhyaś ca |
GE07bhg4c16u:661: tataś ca modiṣye harṣaṃ lapsye nartakyādibhiḥ sahety evam ajñānenāvivekena vimohitā vividhaṃ mohaṃ bhrama-paramparāṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:664: baladevaḥ : nanu sampadā kulena cānye tvat-samā vīkṣyante tat katham
GE07bhg4c16u:665: īśvaras tvam iti ced āha āḍhyaḥ sampannaḥ svato 'ham asmy abhijanavān kulīnaś ca |
GE07bhg4c16u:666: na tu kenacin nimittenāto mat-sadṛśo 'nyaḥ ko 'sti |
GE07bhg4c16u:668: ato 'haṃ tv abalenaiva yakṣye divyāṅganānāṃ saṅgatiḥ kariṣye |
GE07bhg4c16u:670: tāsām adharādi khaṇḍayiṣāmy eva mohiṣa ity
GE07bhg4c16u:673: cira-prayāsa-sādhyeṣu vastuṣ yac cittaṃ tena vibhrāntā vikṣiptā
GE07bhg4c16u:674: moha-mayena jālena samāvṛtā matsyā iva tato nirgantu-kṣamāḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:676: prasaktā madhye mṛtāḥ santo narake patanty aśucau vaitaraṇyādau ||15-16||
GE07bhg4c16u:680: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtā yat prāpnuvanti tac chṛṇu aneketi |
GE07bhg4c16u:685: evaṃ kāma-bhogeṣu prasaktā abhiniviṣṭā santo 'śucau kalmaṣe narake patanti ||16||
GE07bhg4c16u:690: tena samyag-āvṛtāḥ sarvato veṣṭitā matsyā iva sūtramayena jālena para-vaśī-kṛtā ity arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:692: api kāma-bhogeṣu prasaktāḥ sarvathā tad-eka-parāḥ pratikṣaṇam
GE07bhg4c16u:700: śrīdharaḥ : yaksya iti ca yas teṣāṃ manoratha uktaḥ sa kevalaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:701: dambhāhaṅkārādi-pradhāna eva na tu sāttvika ity abhiprāyeṇāha ātmeti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c16u:705: dhanena yo manomadaś ca tābhyāṃ samanvitāḥ santas te |
GE07bhg4c16u:708: soma-yājīty evam ādi nāma-mātra-prasiddhaye ye yajñās tair yajante |
GE07bhg4c16u:714: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu teṣām api keṣāṃcid vaidike karmaṇi yāga-dānādau
GE07bhg4c16u:715: pravṛtti-darśanād ayuktaṃ narake patanam iti nety āha ātma-sambhāvitā iti
GE07bhg4c16u:716: | sarva-guṇa-viśiṣṭatā vayam ity ātmanaiva saṃbhāvitāḥ pūjyatāṃ prāpitā na tu sādhubhiḥ kaiścit
GE07bhg4c16u:719_0: dhana-nimitto yo māna ātmani pūjyatvātiśayādhyāsas tan-nimittaś ca yo madaḥ parasmin
GE07bhg4c16u:719_1: gurvādāv apy apūjyatvābhimānas tābhyām anvitās te nāma-yajñaiḥ nāma-mātrair yajñair
GE07bhg4c16u:721: vihitāṅgeti-kartavyatā-rahitair dambhena dharma-dhvajitayā na tu śraddhayā
GE07bhg4c16u:724: viśvanāthaḥ : ātmanaiva sambhāvitāḥ pūjyatāṃ nītā na tu sādhubhiḥ kaiścid ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:731: dhanena sampadā mānena ca paramahaṃso mahā-śramaṇaḥ śrī-pūjya-pādo mahā-pūjāvid ity evaṃ lakṣaṇena ssat-kāreṇa
GE07bhg4c16u:734: pūjā-vidhibhiḥ sva-kalpitā devatā yajante sva-svakānāṃ gṛhiṇām abhyudayāya dambhena dharma-dhvajitvena viśiṣṭā virakta-veśāḥ santa ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:737: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:739: śrīdharaḥ : avidhi-pūrvakatvam eva prapañcayati ahaṅkāram iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:740: ahaṅkārādīn saṃśritāḥ santaḥ ātma-para-deheṣv ātma-deheṣu para-deheṣu ca
GE07bhg4c16u:742: dambha-yajñeṣu śraddhāyā abhāvād ātmano vṛthaiva pīḍā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c16u:743: tathā paśv-ādīnām apy avidhinā hiṃsāyāṃ caitanya-droha evāvaśiṣyata iti pradviṣanta ity uktam |
GE07bhg4c16u:746: pravṛttānām āsurāṇāṃ bahiraṅga-sādhanam api yāga-dānādikaṃ karma na sidhyati, antaraṅga-sādhanaṃ tu jñāna-vairāgya-bhagavad-bhajanādi teṣāṃ durāpās tam evety āha ahaṅkāram iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:749: etais tv āropitair guṇair ātmano mahattvābhimānam ahaṅkāraṃ tathā balaṃ para-paribhava-nimittaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:755: evam anyāṃś ca mahato doṣān saṃśritāḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:756: etādṛśā api patitās tava bhaktyā pūtāḥ santo narake na patiṣyantīti cen nety āha mām īśvaraṃ bhagavantam apara-deheṣu ātmanāṃ teṣām āsurāṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:757: pareṣāṃ ca tat-putra-bhāryādīnāṃ deheṣu premāspadeṣu tat-tad-buddhi-karma-sākṣitayā santam atipremāspadam api
GE07bhg4c16u:758: durdaiva-paripākāt pradviṣanta īśvarasya mama śāsanaṃ śruti-smṛti-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:761: nṛpādy-ājñā-laṅghanam eva hi tat-pradveṣa iti prasiddhaṃ loke
GE07bhg4c16u:762: nanu gurvādayaḥ kathaṃ tān nānuśāsati tatrāha abhyasūyakā gurv-ādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:764: atas te sarva-sādhana-śūnyā naraka eva patantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:765: mām ātma-para-deheṣv ity asyāparā vyākhyā sva-deheṣu para-deheṣu ca
GE07bhg4c16u:766: cid-aṃśena sthitaṃ māṃ pradviṣantāṃ yajante dambha-yajñeṣu śraddhāyā abhāvād dīkṣādinātmano vṛtahiva pīḍā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c16u:767: tathā paśv-ādīnām apy avidhinā hiṃsayā caitanya-droha-mātram avaśiṣyata iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:768: aparā vyākhyā ātma-dehe jīvān āviṣṭe bhagaval-līlā-vigrahe
GE07bhg4c16u:771: para-deheṣu bhakta-deheṣu prahlādādi-samākhyeṣu sarvadāvirbhūtaṃ māṃ pradviṣanta iti yojanā
GE07bhg4c16u:773: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam |
GE07bhg4c16u:776: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ || [Gītā 9.11-12]
GE07bhg4c16u:777: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ [Gītā 8.23] iti cānyatra |
GE07bhg4c16u:778: tathā ca bhajanīye dveṣān na bhaktyā pūtanā teṣāṃ sambhavatīty arthaḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:779: viśvanāthaḥ : māṃ paramātmānam amānayanta eva pradviṣantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:780: yad vā ātma-parāḥ paramātma-parāyaṇāḥ sādhavas teṣāṃ deheṣu sthitaṃ māṃ pradviṣantaḥ sādhu-deha-dveṣād eva mad-dveṣa iti bhāvaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:782: baladevaḥ : sarvathā veda-tat-pratipādyeśvarāvamantarāc ta ity āha
GE07bhg4c16u:784: ahaṅkārādīn saṃśritās te ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca deheṣu niyāmakatayā bhartṛtayā cāvasthitaṃ māṃ sarveśvaraṃ mad-viṣayakaṃ vedaṃ ca pradviṣanto 'vajñayākurvanto bhavanti |
GE07bhg4c16u:785: abhyasūyakāḥ kuṭila-yuktibhir mama vedasya ca guṇeṣu doṣān āropayantaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:793: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān |
GE07bhg4c16u:794: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu ||19||
GE07bhg4c16u:795: śrīdharaḥ : teṣāṃ ca kadācid api āsura-svabhāva-pracyutir na bhavatīty āha
GE07bhg4c16u:797: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu janma-mṛtyu-mārgeṣu
GE07bhg4c16u:798: tatrāpy āsurīṣv evātikrūrāsu vyāghra-sarpādi-yoniṣu ajasram anavarataṃ kṣipāmi |
GE07bhg4c16u:799: teṣāṃ pāpa-karmaṇāṃ tādṛśaṃ phalaṃ dadāmīty arthaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c16u:800: madhusūdanaḥ : teṣāṃ tvat-kṛpayā kadācin nistāraḥ syād iti nety āha tān iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:801: tān san-mārga-pratipakṣa-bhūtān dviṣataḥ sādhūn mā ca krūrān hiṃsā-parān ato narādhamān atininidtān ajasraṃ santatam aśubhān
GE07bhg4c16u:802: aśubha-karma-kāriṇo 'haṃ sarva-karma-phala-dāteśvaraḥ saṃsāreṣv eva naraka-saṃsaraṇa-mārgeṣu kṣipāmi pātayāmi |
GE07bhg4c16u:803: naraka-gatāś cāsurīṣv evātikrūrāsu vyāghra-sarpādi-yoniṣu tat-tat-karma-vāsanānusāreṇa kṣipāmīty anuṣajyate |
GE07bhg4c16u:804: etādṛśeṣu drohiṣu nāsti mameśvarasya kṛpety arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:805: tathā ca śrutiḥ - atha ya iha kapūya-caraṇā abhyāśo ha yat te kapūyāṃ yonim
GE07bhg4c16u:806: āpadyerañ śva-yoniṃ vā sūkara-yoniṃ vā caṇḍāla-yoniṃ vā [ChāU 5.10.7] iti
GE07bhg4c16u:807: | kapūya-caraṇāḥ kutsita-karmāṇo 'bhyāśo ha śīghram eva kapūyāṃ kutsitāṃyonim āpadyanta iti śruter arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:808: ata eva pūrva-pūrva-karmānusāritvān neśvarasya vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ vā |
GE07bhg4c16u:809: tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ - vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati [Vs 2.1.34] iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:810: evaṃ ca pāpa-karmāṇy eva teṣāṃ kārayati bhagavāṃs teṣu tad-bīja-sattvāt |
GE07bhg4c16u:812: tan-nāśaka-puṇyopacayābhāvāt purṇyopacayaṃ na kārayati teṣām ayogyatvāt |
GE07bhg4c16u:814: īśvaratvād ayogyasyāpi yogyatāṃ sampādayituṃ śaknotīti cet, śaknoty eva satya-saṅkalpatvāt yadi saṅkalpayet |
GE07bhg4c16u:817: ata eva śrūyate - eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma
GE07bhg4c16u:818: kārayati taṃ yam unninīṣate, eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:819: yeṣu prasāda-kāraṇam asty ājñā-pālanādi teṣu prasīdati |
GE07bhg4c16u:820: yeṣu tu tad-vaiparītyaṃ teṣu na prasīdati sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāva iti kim atra vaiṣamyam |
GE07bhg4c16u:821: parāt tu tac chruteḥ [Vs. 2.3.39] iti nyāyāc ca |
GE07bhg4c16u:822: antato gatvā kiṃcid vaiṣamyāpādane mahā-māyatvād adoṣaḥ ||19||
GE07bhg4c16u:824: baladevaḥ : eṣām āsura-svabhāvān kvacid api vimokṣo na bhavatīty āha tān iti dvābhyām |
GE07bhg4c16u:826: tat-tat-karmānu-guṇa-phaladaḥ sarveśvaro 'ham ajasraṃ punaḥ punaḥ kṣipāmi
GE07bhg4c16u:828: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani |
GE07bhg4c16u:829: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim ||20||
GE07bhg4c16u:831: te ca mām aprāpyaiva iti eva-kāreṇa
GE07bhg4c16u:833: mat-prāpty-upāyaṃ san-mārgam aprāpya tato 'py adhamāṃ kṛmi-kīṭādi-yoniṃ yāntīty uktam |
GE07bhg4c16u:835: madhusūdanaḥ : nanu teṣām api krameṇa bahūnāṃ janmanām ante [Gītā 7.19]
GE07bhg4c16u:836: śreyo bhaviṣyati nety āha āsurīm iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:837: ye kadācid āsurīṃ yonim āpannās te janmani janmani prati janma mūḍhās tamo-bahulatvenāvivekinas tatas tasmād api yānty adhamāṃ gatiṃ nikṛṣṭatamāṃ gatim |
GE07bhg4c16u:843: pūrva-pūrva-nikṛṣṭa-yonito nikṛṣṭatamām adhamāṃ yonim uttarottaraṃ gacchantīty arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:844: he kaunteyeti nija-sambandha-kathanena tvam ito nistīrṇa iti sūcayati |
GE07bhg4c16u:845: yasmād ekadāsurīṃ yonim āpannānām uttarottaraṃ nikṛṣṭatara-nikṛṣṭatama-yoni-lābho na tu
GE07bhg4c16u:846_0: atyanta-tamo-bahulatvāt, tasmād yāvan manuṣya-deha-lābho 'sti tāvan mahatāpi prayatnenāsuryāḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:846_1: sampadaḥ parama-kaṣṭatamāyāḥ parihārāya tvarayaiva yathā-śakti daivī sampad anuṣṭheyā
GE07bhg4c16u:850: ihaiva naraka-vyādheś cikitsāṃ na karoti yaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:851: gatvā nirauṣadhaṃ sthānaṃ sa-rujaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati || iti ||20||
GE07bhg4c16u:852: viśvanāthaḥ : mām aprāpyaiveti na tu māṃ prāpyeti |
GE07bhg4c16u:853: vaivasvata-manvantararīyāṣṭāviṃśa-caturvyuga-dvāparānte 'vatīrṇaṃ māṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kaṃsādi-rūpās te prāpya pradviṣanto 'pi muktim eva prāpnuvantīti
GE07bhg4c16u:854: bhakti-jñāna-paripākato labhyām api muktiṃ tādṛśa-pāpibhyo 'py aham
GE07bhg4c16u:856: nibhṛta-marun-mano 'kṣa dṛḍha-yoga-yujo hṛdi yan munaya upāsate tad-arayo 'pi yayuḥ smaraṇāt [BhP 10.87.23] iti śrutayo 'py āhuḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:857: ataḥ pūrvoktā mamaiva sarvotkarṣo varīvartīti bhāgavatāmṛta-kārikā yathā -
GE07bhg4c16u:858: māṃ kṛṣṇa-rūpiṇaṃ yāvan nāpnuvanti mama dviṣaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:859: tāvad evādhamaṃ yoniṃ prāpnuvantīti hi sphuṭam || iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:861: baladevaḥ : nanu bahu-janmānte teṣāṃ kadācit tvad-anukampayāsurayoner
GE07bhg4c16u:862: vimuktiḥ syād iti cet tatrāha āsurīm iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:863: te mūḍhā janmany āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mām aprāpyaiva tato 'py adhamām atinikṛṣṭāṃ śvādi-yoniṃ yānti |
GE07bhg4c16u:864: mām aprāpyaiva atra eva-kāreṇa mad-anukampāyāḥ sambhāvanāpi nāsti |
GE07bhg4c16u:867: kapūya-caraṇā abhyāso ha yat te kapūyāṃ yonim āpadyeran śva-yoniṃ vā
GE07bhg4c16u:868: śūkara-yoniṃ vā caṇḍāla-yoniṃ vā [ChāU 5.10.7] ity ādikā |
GE07bhg4c16u:869: nanv īśvaraḥ satya-saṅkalpatvāday ayogyasyāpi yogyatāṃ śaknuvāt kartum iti cet, śaknuyād eva |
GE07bhg4c16u:870: yadi saṅkalpayet bījābhāvān na saṅkalpayatīty atas tasyā vaiṣamyam āha sūtrakāraḥ - vaiṣyamya-niarghṛṇye na [Vs 2.1.35] ity ādinā |
GE07bhg4c16u:871: tataś ca tān aham ity ādi-dvayaṃ sūpapannam |
GE07bhg4c16u:873: ye tu śāpād asurās tad-anuyāyinaś ca rājanyāḥ pratyakṣe upendra-nṛhari-varāhādau viṣṇau sva-śatru-pakṣatvena vidveṣiṇo
GE07bhg4c16u:874: 'pi veda-vaidika-karma-parāḥ sarva-niyantāraṃ kāla-śaktikam apratyakṣaṃ sarveśvaraṃ manyante
GE07bhg4c16u:875: te tūpendrādibhir nihatāḥ kramāt tyajanty āsurī-yonim |
GE07bhg4c16u:880: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet ||21||
GE07bhg4c16u:882: doṣa-trayaṃ sarvathā varjanīyam ity āha trividham iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:883: kāmaḥ krodho lobhaś ceti idaṃ trividhaṃ narakasya dvāram |
GE07bhg4c16u:887: madhusūdanaḥ : nanv āsurī sampad ananta-bhedavatī kathaṃ puruṣāyuṣeṇāpi parihartuṃ śakyaitetvāśaṅkya tāṃ saṅkṣipyāha trividham iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:888: idaṃ trividhaṃ tri-prakāraṃ narakasya prāptau dvāraṃ sādhanaṃ sarvasyā āsuryāḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:891: ity ata āha kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobha iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:893: yasmād etat trayam eva sarvānartha-mūlaṃ tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet |
GE07bhg4c16u:894: etat-traya-tyāgenaiva sarvāpy āsurī sampat tyaktā bhavati |
GE07bhg4c16u:897: viśvanāthaḥ : tad evam āsurīḥ samapttīr vistārya proktā itas tataḥ sādhūktam mā śucaḥ sampadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si bhārata iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:898: kiṃ vāsurāṇām etat trikam eva svābhāvikam ity āha trividham iti ||21||
GE07bhg4c16u:899: baladevaḥ : nanv āsurīṃ prakṛtiṃ naraka-hetuṃ śrutvā ye manuṣyās tāṃ parihartum icchanti |
GE07bhg4c16u:900: taiḥ kim anuṣṭheyam iti cet tatrāha trividham iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:901: etat-traya-parihāre tasyāḥ parihāraḥ syād ity arthaḥ ||21||
GE07bhg4c16u:903: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamo-dvārais tribhir naraḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:904: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim ||22||
GE07bhg4c16u:905: śrīdharaḥ : tyāge ca viśiṣṭaṃ phalam āha etair iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:906: tamaso narakasya dvāra-bhūtair etais tribhiḥ kāmādibhir vimukto nara ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ sādhanaṃ tapo-yogādikam ācarati |
GE07bhg4c16u:908: madhusūdanaḥ : etat trayaṃ tyajataḥ kiṃ syād iti tatrāha etair iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:910_0: kāma-krodha-lobhais tribhir tamo-dvārair naraka-sādhanair vimukto virahitaḥ puruṣa
GE07bhg4c16u:910_1: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyo yad dhitaṃ veda-bodhitaṃ he kaunteya pūrvaṃ hi kāmādi-pratibaddhaḥ
GE07bhg4c16u:913: tat-pratibandha-rahitaḥ sann aśreyo nācarati śreyaś cācarati tata aihikaṃ sukham anubhūya samyag-dhī-dvārā yāti parāṃ gatiṃ mokṣam ||16.22||
GE07bhg4c16u:915: baladevaḥ : tat-tyāge phalam āha etair iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:921: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim ||23||
GE07bhg4c16u:922: śrīdharaḥ : kāmādi-tyāgaś ca sva-dharmācaraṇaṃ vinā na sambhavatīty āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:923: śāstra-vidhiṃ veda-vihitaṃ dharmam utsṛjya yaḥ kāma-cārato
GE07bhg4c16u:924: yathecchaṃ vartate sa siddhiṃ tattva-jñānaṃ na prāpnoti |
GE07bhg4c16u:925: na ca parāṃ gatiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti ||23||
GE07bhg4c16u:926: madhusūdanaḥ : yasmād aśreyo nācaraṇasya śreya-ācaraṇasya ca śāstram eva
GE07bhg4c16u:927: nimittaṃ tayoḥ śāstraika-gamyatvāt tasmāt ya iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:930: | tat-sambandhī vidhi-liṅ-ādi-śabdaḥ kuryān na kuryād ity
GE07bhg4c16u:934_0: utsṛjyāśraddhayā parityajya kāma-kārataḥ svecchā-mātreṇa vartate vihitam api nācarati
GE07bhg4c16u:934_1: niṣiddham apy ācarati yaḥ sa siddhim puruṣārtha-prāpti-yogyatām antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhiṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:935: nāpnoti, na sukham aihikaṃ, nāpi parāṃ gatim svargaṃ mokṣaṃ vā ||23||
GE07bhg4c16u:936: viśvanāthaḥ : āstikyavata eva śreya ity āha ya iti kāma-cārataḥ ||23||
GE07bhg4c16u:937: baladevaḥ : kāmādi-tyāgaḥ sva-dharmād vinā na bhavet |
GE07bhg4c16u:938: sva-dharmaś ca śāstrād vinā na sidhyed ataḥ śāstram evāstheyaṃ sudhiyety āha ya iti |
GE07bhg4c16u:939: kāma-cārataḥ svācchandyena yo vartate vihitam api na karoti |
GE07bhg4c16u:943: sukham upaśamātmakaṃ ca parāṃ gatiṃ muktiṃ kuto vāpnuyāt ||23||
GE07bhg4c16u:948: idaṃ kāryam idam akāryam ity asyāṃ vyavasthāyāṃ te tava śāstraṃ śruti-smṛti-purāṇādikam eva pramāṇam |
GE07bhg4c16u:950: śāstra-vidhānoktaṃ karma jñātvā iha karmādhikāre vartmāno yathā 'dhikāraṃ
GE07bhg4c16u:951: karma kartum arhasi tan-mūlatvāt sattva-śuddhi-samyag jñāna-muktīnām ity arthaḥ ||24||
GE07bhg4c16u:958_0: kāmādhīna-pravṛttir aihika-pāratrika-sarva-puruṣārtha-yogyas tasmāt te tava śreyo
GE07bhg4c16u:958_1: 'rthinaḥ kāryākārya-vyavasthitau kiṃ kāryaṃ kim akāryam iti viṣaye śāstraṃ veda-tad-upajīvi-smṛti-purāṇādikam
GE07bhg4c16u:960: evaṃ ceha karmādhikāra-bhūmau śāstra-vidhānena kuryān na kuryād ity
GE07bhg4c16u:962: pratiṣiddhaṃ ca jñātvā niṣiddhaṃ varjayan vihitaṃ kṣatriyasya
GE07bhg4c16u:963: yuddhādi-karma tvaṃ kartum arhasi sattva-śuddhi-paryantam ity arthaḥ |
GE07bhg4c16u:964: tad evam asminn adhyāye sarvasyā āsuryāḥ sampado mūla-bhūtān
GE07bhg4c16u:967: tad-upadiṣṭārthānuṣṭhāna-pareṇa bhavativyam iti saṃpad-dvaya-vibhāga-pradarśana-mukhena nirdhāritam ||24|| iti
GE07bhg4c16u:973: āstikā eva vindanti sad-gatiṃ santa eva te |
GE07bhg4c16u:977: baladevaḥ : yasmāc chāstra-vimukhatayā kāmādy-adhīnā pravṛttiḥ pumarthād vibhraṃśayati
GE07bhg4c16u:978: tasmāt tava kāryākārya-vyavasthitau kiṃ kartavyaṃ kim
GE07bhg4c16u:979: akartavyam ity asmin viṣaye nirdoṣam apauruṣeyaṃ veda-rūpaṃ śāstram eva pramāṇam |
GE07bhg4c16u:982: śāstra-vidhānena kuryān na kuryād iti pravartanā-nivartanātmakena
GE07bhg4c16u:984: karma vihitaṃ niṣiddhaṃ ca jñātvā niṣiddhaṃ tat parityajan iha karma-bhūmau vihita-karmāgni-hotrādi yuddhādi ca kartum
GE07bhg4c16u:986: vedārtha-naiṣṭhikā yānti svargaṃ mokṣaṃ ca śāśvatam |
